chapter.title: Configurations
chapter.para: There are several areas that you can edit to change how the enrolment process works.

section.title: Mandatory/Optional
section.para: You have the ability to choose whether an enrolment question is made mandatory, optional or hidden within the CMS by going Site Setting -> Contact Entry. The first three questions 'First name', 'Last name' and 'Email' are set to Required as default and can't be changed. The other questions will have a drop down next to them so you can choose whether that question is made mandatory, optional or hiddens for the enrolment process, waiting list and mailing list. The three options in the drop down list are 'Show', 'Hide' and 'Required'.

caption.para: Choosing whether you want a question to be mandatory, optional or hidden during the online enrolment process

section.title: Custom Fields
section.para: Any custom fields created within the contact record of onCourse will be added to the list of questions that can be added to the online enrolment process, waiting list and mailing list. You will also be able to choose whether these questions are made mandatory, optional or hidden. They are set to 'Hide' as default.

caption.para: Where the Custom fields created in onCourse will appear within the CMS

section.title: Minimum Age
section.para: There is an option to also only allow online enrolments above a certain age. It's set to 0 as default and can be changed at the bottom of the Contact Entry page within the CMS.

caption.para: The field where you can choose if there is a minimum age to enrol online
